mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (bno , mno , content) values ( #{bno} , #{mno} , #{content} )
mapper.select: select r.rno , r.bno , m.nickname , r.content , r.regdate from tbl_member m, (select * from tbl_reply where bno = #{bno} ) r where r.mno = m.mno;
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set bno = #{bno} , mno = #{mno} , content = #{content} where rno = #{rno}
